欪字的基本解释

欪
chù
无心；一说无知。
呵斥。

欪
qù
说。

欪
xì
笑。

欪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chù］
［《廣韻》丑律切，入術，徹。］
(1)见“咄欪”。
(2)没有心计。一说无知。
(3)呵斥。
[②]［xī］
［《集韻》敕栗切，入質，徹。］
同“咥1”。
笑。
[③]［qù］
［《集韻》閴吉切，入術，溪。］
说话。

欪字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【欠字部】　欪； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页566第33
【唐韻】丑律切【集韻】敕律切，?音黜。【說文】咄欪，無慙也。一曰無腸意。　又【集韻】許勿切，音䬍。義同。　又【廣韻】許吉切【集韻】閴吉切，?音欯。【廣韻】訶也。【集韻】說也。　又【集韻】喫吉切，音詰。又呼八切，音搰。義?同。又【集韻】敕栗切，chì音抶。與咥同。笑也。

欪字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
欪字的起名意思

暂无。

欪

Unintentional; talk about ignorance.
Scolded.

欪
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chù］
["Guangyun" ugly law cut, into the art, thorough. ]
(1) See "Duh".
(2) No scheming. Talk about ignorance.
(3) Reprimand.
[②]［xī］
["Ji Yun" Chi chestnut cut, into the quality, thorough. ]
Same as "咥1".
laugh.
[③]［qù］
["Ji Yun" Chi Ji cut, enter the technique, the stream. ]
speak.
欪
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Own Words] 　欪; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 566 33
[Tang Yun] Ugly Lv Cut [Ji Yun] Di Lv cut, sound cut. [Said the text] Duh, there is no trouble. One said no intestines.　[Jiyun] Xu Wuqie, Yin Qi. The same meaning.　[Guangyun] Xu Jiqie【Jiyun】Bei Jiqie,? Yin 欯. [Guang Yun] He also. [Jiyun] Say it.　[Jiyun] Eat Jiqie, sound interrogation. He called eight cuts again, and the sound dilated. Righteous? Same. Also 【Jiyun】cut chestnut, chì sound. Same with Bae. Laugh too.
